title: Peaceful Country Escape Near Sydney
description: Enjoy a little peace and quiet with an escape to the foothills of Barrington Tops World Heritage-listed National Park. Unwind in the tranquility of your Boutique Room at Riverwood Downs, a secluded resort away from the crowds. Enjoy daily continental breakfast, a complimentary dessert when purchasing a two-course meal at the Barrington Bar & Grill restaurant, complimentary canoe hire and late 12pm checkout. PLUS two kids aged 16 and under stay free.
